articles.title: Meet Ollie the Therapy Dog that brings joy to the Paediatric Unit at University Hospital Galway
articles.description: Ollie is an 8 year old Malshi, he is the first four legged team member in the Paediatric Unit at University Hospital Galway (UHG).
